page.title: 06Religion in Kilbarchan
page.content: There are two churches in {Kilbarchan} and a{Memorial Hall}.The two churches are {Churches of Scotland}and the{ {Memorial Hall}is of the{Christian {Brethren Religion.}All three churches have Sunday Schools catering for children from three years up to fourteen years of age.The{Rev.S.Palmer minister of the{East Church},is the School Chaplain and visits the school regularly to talk to the pupils.The minister of the{West Church}is {Rev.A.Kerr.}In {Brookfield}there are no churches so anyone wishing to attend church must go eleswhere.There are many organizations associated with the churches.During the summer months there are 9.30am services in addition to the 11.00am services each Sunday in the East Church.During the winter months evening services are held in both churches.
